channel.title: Desert Wind SUP - Relaxation, Fitness, and FUN!
channel.description: Desert Wind SUP - Relaxation, Fitness, and FUN!

item.title: BIC SUP Tracer paddleboard series
item.description:
BIC SUP Tracer paddleboard series

BIC SUP's new TRACER series ("Touring-Racer") excels as both a performance race board and an all-purpose touring board. Designed for riders who want speed and glide as well as comfort and stability, these new shapes are heavily influenced by the RACE-PRO series of high performance racing machines (fine-tuned by professional racers Eric Terrien and Chase Kosterlitz) and the award-winning Wing Touring series (lauded for their stability and ease of use).

item.title: How to repair a leak in an inflatable SUP
item.description:
How to repair a leak in an inflatable SUP

An inflatable SUP is always a delicate equipment. Rocks, corals, nails, sharp objects, and daily handling can easily cause holes and tears in the tissue. The world's best inflatable stand-up paddleboards can usually handle heavy beatings, but sometimes it is just too much. If you found that your SUP is leaking air, don't panic.

item.title: Paddle Boarding Central Idaho, U.S.A | Supconnect.com
item.description:
Paddle Boarding Central Idaho, U.S.A | Supconnect.com

Aptly known as the "Whitewater State," Idaho boasts more navigable river miles than any other in the U.S. not to mention a profusion of pristine alpine lakes - all swathed in a tapestry of national forests (Boise, Sawtooth and Salmon-Challis), dramatic mountains, and deep gorges.

item.title: Suzie Cooney Give Expert Paddling Tips for Peak Performance
item.description:
Suzie Cooney Give Expert Paddling Tips for Peak Performance

Great video from author Suzie Cooney where she give tons of tips for off water training that will help with stroke, balance, agility, and will definitely burn some calories!

item.title: WHEN THE BOARD IS YOUR MAT - SUP INTERNATIONAL MAGAZINE
item.description:
WHEN THE BOARD IS YOUR MAT - SUP INTERNATIONAL MAGAZINE

SUP Yoga involves taking your Yoga practice onto the water using a Stand Up Paddle Board, adding new challenges and giving you a completely new experience. We feel every muscle engage, keeping the body balanced and stable on the board, constantly adjusting, allowing for the water moving underneath you.

item.title: Valentine's Day - SUP Style | SUP Magazine
item.description:
Valentine's Day - SUP Style | SUP Magazine

Valentine's Day is just a day away and if you're still scrambling to make plans with your special someone, SUP the Mag has you covered. Instead of trying to make last minute dinner reservations like everyone else, spend some quality paddling time with your sweetheart.

item.title: Finding Balance: A Simple Way To Destress And Enjoy Life
item.description:
Finding Balance: A Simple Way To Destress And Enjoy Life

Finding balance By Kate Watson Life is about striking a balance; so clichÃ©, yet so true. It is an age-old struggle about following your dreams, making enough money to fulfill them, and finding time for family, friends and adventure. Recently I have been out of balance. How can I tell?
